title: My solo queue experience and its potential!
body:
I have 21 games as twitch on my profile, I have gone very positive in 95%+ of those games (one game I had a negative score). Yet I have won 59.1% of those games.

Could someone please compare this to a diamond smurf cause apparently they get 65% win rate or higher, so I would just like to compare the scores of them to mine, from this we should be able to determine the comparison of teammates that they get, and those that i get.

Last season I had a 60% win rate over 336 games as twitch.

I have climbed out of bronze 3 times and now for the 4th time I have been put back into bronze 4 from the reset winning 5/10 of my games from silver 4.

If I were to have balanced teams, I should be winning over 80% of those games even with the occasional team being unable to find their keyboard during a teamfight, or the tanks sitting behind me as the entire enemy team engages, or my adc who thinks its their job to run through an enemy nasus jarvan and blitzcrank to try kill a malzahar. Maybe even with my support who thinks their role is to copy the adc, thereby taking farm and kills from me as thresh. Even when I am maxed build by 33 minutes and my teammates average score is 2-7 and think they should sit behind me when I am the adc. Even if my volibear did initiate a fight by throwing the fed pure armour/devourers udyr on top of me as I unstealth as twitch to teamfight.

If those things were to occasionally happen in my games, I would be diamond by now if the rest of my games were balanced and the teams were evenly skilled according to me right?

So apparently I keep getting told that it is up to me whether I get out of low elo or not, so according to absolutely everyone, I should be diamond+, and yet according to everyone I apparently need to get better, because going 22-12 as the ad carry and not having anyone peel for me is my fault and I should be able to stop that from happening because apparently this is not a team game and it is purely up to me whether or not my teammates can do their job in the situation that is given.

Playing over 3000 games and being able to do my job effectively in at least 90% of those games should effectively give me around a 70% win ratio with 20% of my games having teammates who are not able to do their role as effectively as the enemy team I should have won 2100 games, and lost 900.

So I should have 1200 wins over even win/loss ratio.

So lets say that I had no bonus mmr gain from winning streaks and no negative for losing streaks.

It takes 140 points approximately (5 wins and 2 promo wins(3 for league promos))

1200 x 20 = 24000 points

So I should have 24000 points lets say from bronze 5 (I started at bronze 3).

Let's say I had to win all 3 games in each promos so we get a stable even amount across all promotion requirements.

24000 ÷ 160 = 150

So if I were to have 1 in 5 of my games as unwinnable due to teammates, I would have gone up 150 divisions from bronze 5.

I would have gone from bronze 5 to diamond 5, 6 times.

If I were to have only played and done my role correctly only 80% of the time with only 1 in 5 teams being too hard to get a victory with.

I would have only gone from bronze 5 to diamond 3 times.

If I were to have only done my role correctly 75% of the time, I should have gone from bronze 5 to diamond 1 time and another account to gold.

With twitch alone, this season I have lost 40% of my games with 100% of those games having a strong positive score and being able to do my job.

40% of my games are unwinnable due to my team being unable to correctly play their roles to an equal standard to the enemy team.

This is an average of my season 5 solo queue experience.

It just so happens that with twitch last season of 336 games, I have a win rate of approximately 60%. Coincidentally that means 40% of my games I lost.

Go ahead and keep telling me that I am the reason I cannot climb to diamond, because if i were you I would've done it 6 times by now and ill keep laughing about it.

replies.body:
Just reading this I can see you are overly arrogant in your own abilities.

"tanks sitting behind me as the entire enemy team engages"/"think they should sit behind me when I am the adc" - Or you are just infront of them? Did that ever occur to you that you are out of position.... OF COURSE NOT.
"support who thinks their role is to copy the adc, thereby taking farm and kills from me" - If you can't out last hit a support you have a problem at last hitting.
"Even if my volibear did initiate a fight by throwing the fed pure armour/devourers udyr on top of me" - If you ultimate should have not enough range to attack you, also if you expected that it could happen why did you not position accordingly?
"Playing over 3000 games" - Still happens? For sure its you not being good enough.

Btw if you were me you would have reached platinum not diamond. Because obviously you think you are diamond material stuck in bronze.

m8 u know wut u need to climb?

a ton of time.

even UberDanger said...

a person with not a lot of skill and a lot of time will get much further (in rank) than a person with a lot of skill and not a lot of time.

just spend assloads of time (more than you should unless you REALLY wanna be a pro gamer which we are all assuming) and you'll get there.

btw you sound as if you're some twelvie who thinks that they should be a pro gamer and dats not cul m8.

now come back when u made karma adc a thing.

Does around 3500 games averaging around 30 minutes each count as spending enough time to climb out of bronze?

Which I have done 3 times already...

Then ur not good enough...

If you’re not getting out of bronze after thousands of games (which is around 10 weeks of solid gameplay no sleep) then you’re simply not good enough to get out of bronze

but if u really insist on blaming ur team which is what all noobs do then go duo queue with someone u trust (or is also blaming/complaining about their team like you are, then once one of u loses you two can end up in an infinite loop of playing ‘blame the player’)

also having the word 'potential' with an exclamation at the end makes you look boring man...unless you're talking about some aspect of the game that isn't the gameplay.

i wud fully respect you if u had said something like 'my art/creativity experience and its potential!' and say how u cud be some champion art designer but dude, ur basically trying to make urself look better and failing miserably without a tl;dr and some math...math is logic and only for theory...hardly anything works like that in real life man.

i cud say how much potential i have as a senior sound designer for riot and i wudn't get half as much h8 as u did just in this one post...

Kda means very little in showing how good you are. You could just be going in to ks or etc which doesnt always progress the game. Objectives are what end the game not all the kills you rack up. Just cause your like 20ish to like 5 doesnt mean you have inpacted the game in anyway to win e.g take towers, inhib etc.

LMAO WhitePumah is a legend people. C'mon. He is the League of Legends community come to life.


Here is an interview that was conducted with the great man: http://forums.oce.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=87575

Why should you read it? Well here is question 1:

>** A common explanation low ELO players provide as to why they remain in low ELO for long periods of time is because they keep on being put with incompetent teammates. In your experience, is there any truth to this statement?**

> Yes
Hes either the best troll, or the biggest idiot. I can never tell.
More like a cockroach that just won't leave.
Just one thing you could pick an ADC with decent self peel, and be less reliant on your team.

Should I adc with braum?

He has a shield and a stun and a knockup and everything!

New meta initiated
Eg caitlyn, lucian, corki, EZREAL, teemo, tristana. AD braum is fun tho.
Oh also you guys might want to actually read the post before you comment, saves you the humiliation of a comment that has not been thought through in full relation to my opening post.

Then you get matched up against the people you think you deserve to be up and lose horribly because its a different experience.
I went 22/7/8 as Morgana a few days ago. Why am I not in the LCS? Those noobs barely ever get that many kills on their whole team. GG.

This post gave me cancer. So you think that because you get a high kda/win rate vsing fellow silver/bronze like yourself, you think you play at diamond level? Yes, your skill level may be higher than that of a bronze. Don't go using the logic that goes along the lines of : Millionaires make money, I make money too, therefore I am a millionaire. Your post is ignorant. Stop comparing to diamond cause I'm pretty sure diamonds aren't stuck in bronze every season. Maybe learn a new role or champ that doesn't depend on late game.

See I might actually believe those comments if I had not performed very highly in every other game I have played..

Maybe I should buy a diamond account so I can be diamond, then I can get recognition from low elo players who will blindly follow me off a cliff if that is where I lead them!

If I had not reached masters in starcraft.

If I had not 25 bomb'd against a professional level Australian counter strike source team in the grand finals of a LAN.

If all that never happened then I may reconsider that what I am saying is all delusional talk and I really am some trash bronze player, but as it stands my evidence is a thousand times stronger than everyone elses.
